snippet: An environmental coalition on Monday charged that coal and coal dust is polluting the Columbia River Gorge, and pledged to sue mining companies and a railroad company if they do not halt the spills.
abstract: Environmental coalition that includes Sierra Club threatens to sue several mining companies and Burlington Northern Santa Fe Railroad, accusing them of coal and coal dust spills that are polluting Oregon's Columbia River Gorge.
lead_paragraph: An environmental coalition on Monday charged that coal and coal dust is polluting the Columbia River Gorge, and pledged to sue mining companies and a railroad company if they do not halt the spills.

headline.main: Oregon: Groups Give Notice of Suit Over Coal Dust
